name: Sticky Cats
description:
Sticky Cats is a 2 - 4 player party game, where players must steal the fish and escape out the window while sticking to everything and causing mayhem along the way.

Gamepad Controls:
Joystick: Move/aim for jumping
A or X button : Jump
Hold back button: Restart level
Hold escape: Return to menu

This game is still in development, so please send any feedback our way.

For more info, please visit stickycatsgame.com or @stickycatsgame on Twitter
